commit message:
Edit Budget/Transaction on long click

Feedback was received on the expected workflow of deleting or
editing a Budget or Transaction. It turns out the expectation
is to long click an item to reveal non-typical options. Clicking
on an object should reveal the most common option.

To this end, a long click on a Budget or Transaction will now bring
up a context menu, showing an edit option. Clicking on a Transaction
will still display it, but clicking on a Budget will no longer
do anything.

Merge pull request #28 from brarcher/editing-budgets

Edit Budget/Transaction on long click

If a transaction has a receipt show a receipt icon

This will help one more easily identify transaction which have
receipts when looking through lists of transactions.

The icon is originally from:
https://icons8.com/web-app/for/all/purchase-order
and permission has been given to use this icon in Budget Watch
by a representative of icons8.

Merge pull request #29 from brarcher/receipt-icon

If a transaction has a receipt show a receipt icon

collapse transaction fragments into one class

There was mostly repeated code in these two classes, which could
be combined by passing in a single parameter.

Display all transactions for budget when budget clicked

If a budget item is clicked, display all transactions for that
budget.

German translations provided by paulle
